sense.gloss: airplane, aeroplane, plane, aircraft
aviation, flight, flying
to fly, to take a flight
to fly, to soar
to jump, to leap, to spring, to bound, to hop
to spatter, to scatter, to splash, to fly (e.g. of sparks)
to hurry, to rush
to flee, to run off, to escape
to disappear, to vanish, to fade, to thin out
to break off, to come off, to fall off, to blow (of a fuse)
to be sent out (of an order), to fly (of false rumours, catcalls, etc.)
to come flying (of a punch, kick, etc.)
to be missing (of a page, stitch, etc.), to skip, to jump (e.g. of a conversation)
selling or divesting in unwanted stocks, hiding bad loans
leap, jump
stepping out into the wider world, becoming active on a wider stage, playing an active part (in)
rapid progress, dramatic development, making great strides, making a leap forward
leap (of logic), jump, gap (in an argument)
something that leaps or thrusts out
rook
airfield, airport
to let fly, to make fly, to send flying, to blow off (e.g. in the wind), to launch, to fire, to hurl, to shoot
to skip over, to leave out, to omit, to drop (e.g. a stitch)
to run fast, to drive fast, to gallop
to spray, to splash, to spatter
to say without reservation, to call out (e.g. a jeer), to rattle off (e.g. a joke)
to spread (e.g. a rumour), to circulate, to send out (a message), to issue (e.g. an appeal)
to transfer (to a less important post), to send away (e.g. to a provincial branch), to demote
to dispatch quickly (e.g. a reporter)
to get rid of, to burn off (alcohol)
to attack (e.g. with a leg manoeuvre)
to do vigorously, to do roughly, to do energetically
jump, plunge, dive
appearing without an appointment, bursting in, arriving unannounced, cropping up suddenly
to jump out, to rush out, to fly out
to appear (suddenly)
to protrude, to project
to butt in
to run away (e.g. from home), to break away, to cut ties with (e.g. workplace)
jumping off
to jump in, to leap in, to plunge into, to dive
to burst in, to barge in
to fly about, to flutter about, to flit about, to fly past each other
coming flying in (migratory birds, airborne sand, pollen, etc.)
coming by airplane
flight, flying, soaring
rook, hisha
scattering (e.g. dust in the wind, enemies before an assault), dispersal, flying off (in all directions), flying apart
taking part on the spur of the moment, participating without registering beforehand, last-minute entrant
specking on flower petals
airship, blimp
to jump up, to start up, to leap to one's feet, to fly away, to take off
leaping flames, flying sparks
spread of fire (due to leaping flames)
repercussions in unanticipated areas, spilling over, effects of an incident spreading to those seemingly uninvolved
impetigo contagiosa
to fly about, to skip about, to bustle about
flying, leaping, flight, leap
zero, naught, oh
flying fish (esp. the Japanese flying fish, Cypselurus agoo)
running out of points (zero or fewer), game ending due to a player running out of points
flying without hindrance
flying bird
Hida (city, region of Gifu Prefecture, Edo-period province)
to jump at, to be attracted by
erratic, offbeat, wild, extraordinary
vapor trail (vapour)

sdata.j: ↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑乱気流↑↓らんきりゅう↓に↑近付↑↓ちかづ↓いていたため↑操縦↑↓そうじゅう↓↑士↑↓し↓は↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓にシートベルトを↑締↑↓し↓めるよう↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

sdata.j: ↑国王↑↓こくおう↓はいつも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑褒↑↓ほ↓めるおべっか↑使↑↓づか↓いにうんざりしていたので↑彼↑↓かれ↓らを↑遠↑↓とお↓くへ↑飛↑↓と↓ばした。
sdata.e: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓で↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓したことがありますか。
sdata.e: Have you ever traveled in a plane?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑親元↑↓おやもと↓から↑飛↑↓と↓び↑出↑↓だ↓せるか。
sdata.e: Can you break away from your parents?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑空↑↓そら↓を↑飛↑↓と↓ぶ↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑見↑↓み↓る↑事↑↓こと↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Do you ever dream about flying through the sky?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑運↑↓うん↓がよかった。↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓は↑定時↑↓ていじ↓↑運航↑↓うんこう↓だよ。
sdata.e: You're in luck. The plane is on time.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓↑飛↑↓と↓ぶ↑円盤↑↓えんばん↓を↑見↑↓み↓た↑事↑↓こと↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Have you ever seen a UFO?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑行動↑↓こうどう↓は↑突飛↑↓とっぴ↓すぎるよ。
sdata.e: Your behavior is too extraordinary.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のために↑模型↑↓もけい↓↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓を↑作↑↓つく↓ってあげよう。
sdata.e: I'll make a model plane for you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑模型↑↓もけい↓↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓を↑作↑↓つく↓ってあげよう。
sdata.e: I'll make you a model plane.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓↑高↑↓たか↓く↑一群↑↓いちぐん↓の↑鳥↑↓とり↓が↑飛↑↓と↓んでいるのを↑見↑↓み↓た。
sdata.e: I saw a flock of birds flying aloft.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑空↑↓そら↓↑高↑↓たか↓く↑飛↑↓と↓んでいる↑鳥↑↓とり↓の↑群↑↓む↓れを↑見↑↓み↓ました。
sdata.e: I saw a flock of birds flying aloft.

sdata.j: ↑鳥↑↓とり↓の↑群↑↓む↓れが↑空↑↓そら↓↑高↑↓たか↓く↑飛↑↓と↓んでいるのを↑見↑↓み↓ました。
sdata.e: I saw a flock of birds flying aloft.

sdata.j: ↑空港↑↓くうこう↓に↑着↑↓つ↓くと、その↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑飛↑↓と↓び↑立↑↓た↓つのが↑見↑↓み↓えた。
sdata.e: Arriving at the airport, I saw the plane taking off.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓を↑飛↑↓と↓んでいる↑蝙蝠↑↓かわほり↓は↑蝶↑↓ちょう↓のように↑見↑↓み↓えますね。
sdata.e: A bat flying in the sky looks like a butterfly.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓を↑飛↑↓と↓んでいる↑鳥↑↓とり↓を↑撃↑↓う↓つ↑事↑↓こと↓は↑難↑↓むずか↓しい。
sdata.e: It is difficult to shoot a bird flying in the air.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓は↑午後↑↓ごご↓２↑時↑↓じ↓に↑香港↑↓ほんこん↓へ↑向↑↓む↓けて↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓します。
sdata.e: His plane leaves for Hong Kong at 2:00 p.m.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓い↑距離↑↓きょり↓を↑伝↑↓つた↓えるのにはくるくる↑輪↑↓わ↓を↑描↑↓えが↓きながら↑踊↑↓おど↓り、もっと↑遠↑↓とお↓い↑距離↑↓きょり↓を↑示↑↓しめ↓すには↑体↑↓からだ↓を↑揺↑↓ゆ↓すったり、↑前後↑↓ぜんご↓に↑飛↑↓と↓んだりする。
sdata.e: They dance in circles to communicate a short distance, and shake their bodies and dart back and forth to indicate a longer distance.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いて↑飛↑↓と↓び↑上↑↓あ↓がったので↑机↑↓つくえ↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓の↑花瓶↑↓かびん↓がひっくり↑返↑↓かえ↓った。
sdata.e: The vase on my desk overturned when I jumped up in surprise.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓に↑逆↑↓さか↓らって↑飛↑↓と↓ぶのは↑大変↑↓たいへん↓なことだ。
sdata.e: Flying against a strong wind is very difficult.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓の↑間↑↓ま↓を↑通↑↓とお↓り↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けるときに、↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓はこんなふうに↑揺↑↓ゆ↓れるんだけど、↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓しなくていいよ。
sdata.e: Passing through the strong wind, the planes rock like this, but don't worry.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓で↑屋根↑↓やね↓を↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑飛↑↓と↓ばされた。
sdata.e: We got our roof blown off in the gale.

sdata.j: ↑魚↑↓さかな↓が↑水面↑↓すいめん↓から↑飛↑↓と↓び↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: A fish leaped out of the water.

sdata.j: ↑巨大↑↓きょだい↓な↑鳥↑↓とり↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓に↑飛↑↓と↓んできた。
sdata.e: A gigantic bird came flying toward him.

sdata.j: ↑究極↑↓きゅうきょく↓↑的↑↓てき↓には↑宇宙↑↓うちゅう↓↑飛行↑↓ひこう↓は↑全↑↓ぜん↓↑人類↑↓じんるい↓に↑有益↑↓ゆうえき↓なものとなろう。
sdata.e: Ultimately, space flight will be beneficial to all mankind.

sdata.j: ボールははずんで↑塀↑↓へい↓を↑飛↑↓と↓び↑越↑↓こ↓えた。
sdata.e: The ball bounced over the wall.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓ぎなさい、そうでないと↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓に↑乗↑↓の↓り↑遅↑↓おく↓れるだろう。
sdata.e: Hurry up, or you'll miss your plane.

sdata.j: ↑機↑↓き↓は↑急↑↓きゅう↓↑角度↑↓かくど↓で↑上昇↑↓じょうしょう↓し、それから↑海岸↑↓かいがん↓を↑離↑↓はな↓れるにつれて↑水平↑↓すいへい↓↑飛行↑↓ひこう↓に↑移↑↓うつ↓った。
sdata.e: The plane rose sharply before leveling off as it left the coast.

sdata.j: ↑間↑↓ま↓もなく↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓は↑動↑↓うご↓き↑始↑↓はじ↓め、その↑後↑↓ご↓↑離陸↑↓りりく↓します。
sdata.e: Soon the plane begins to move, and then it takes off.

sdata.j: ↑侃侃諤諤↑↓かんかんがくがく↓の↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓が↑飛↑↓と↓び↑交↑↓か↓うような↑会議↑↓かいぎ↓、といったことは↑最近↑↓さいきん↓はやらないのかね。
sdata.e: I wonder if they don't have meetings anymore where strong words fly and everyone goes at each other tooth and nail.
